title: rsharerjs
code: social_btns(   url = "https://paithiov909.github.io/rsharerjs/",   title = "An HTML Widgets Wrapping 'sharer.js'") social_btns(   url = "https://paithiov909.github.io/rsharerjs/",   title = "An HTML Widgets Wrapping 'sharer.js'",   media =  c(     "twitter",     "facebook",     "linkedin",     "email",     "whatsapp"   ) ) social_btns(   url = "https://paithiov909.github.io/rsharerjs/",   title = "An HTML Widgets Wrapping 'sharer.js'",   media =  c(     "telegram",     "viber",     "pinterest",     "tumblr",     "hackernews"   ) ) social_btns(   url = "https://paithiov909.github.io/rsharerjs/",   title = "An HTML Widgets Wrapping 'sharer.js'",   media =  c(     "reddit",     "vk.com",     "buffer",     "xing",     "line"   ) ) social_btns(   url = "https://paithiov909.github.io/rsharerjs/",   title = "An HTML Widgets Wrapping 'sharer.js'",   media =  c(     "instapapaer",     "pocket",     "flipboard",     "weibo",     "blogger"   ) ) social_btns(   url = "https://paithiov909.github.io/rsharerjs/",   title = "An HTML Widgets Wrapping 'sharer.js'",   media =  c(     "baidu",     "ok.ru",     "evernote",     "skype",     "trello"   ) )

title: An HTML Widget Wrapping sharer.js
text: Create social share buttons R Markdown Shiny. package provides function social_btns() display simple set social share buttons R Markdown Shiny apps. widget includes ellisonleao/sharer.js. Displaying widgets requires fontawesome boostrap.

title: Shiny bindings for sharer — sharer-shiny
text: Output render functions using sharer within Shiny applications interactive Rmd documents.

title: Shiny bindings for sharer — sharer-shiny
code: sharerOutput(outputId, width = "100%", height = "400px")  renderSharer(expr, env = parent.frame(), quoted = FALSE)

title: Shiny bindings for sharer — sharer-shiny
text: outputId output variable read width, height Must valid CSS unit (like '100%', '400px', 'auto') number, coerced string 'px' appended. expr expression generates sharer env environment evaluate expr. quoted expr quoted expression (quote())? useful want save expression variable.

title: Create social share buttons — social_btns
text: Create social share buttons R Markdown Shiny.

title: Create social share buttons — social_btns
code: social_btns(   url,   title,   media = c("twitter", "facebook", "reddit"),   width = "100%",   height = "4.25em" )

title: Create social share buttons — social_btns
text: url url string share. title title string share. media sharers set widget. width width widget's wrapper. height height widget's wrapper.

title: Create social share buttons — social_btns
text: object class htmlwidget intelligently print   HTML variety contexts including R console, within R   Markdown documents, within Shiny output bindings.
